definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
niche for statue (esp. Buddhist, Christian etc)
see 龍龕手鑑|龙龛手鉴[Long2 kan1 Shou3 jian4]

Longkan Shoujian, Chinese character dictionary from 997 AD containing 26,430 entries, with radicals placed into 240 rhyme groups and arranged according to the four tones, and the rest of the characters similarly arranged under each radical
niche as shown in an X-Ray (medicine)

sentences.english: Barium radiography showed there were filling defect, niche, bridging fold, etc.
sentences.chinese: 鋇劑造影表現是充盈缺損，龕影和橋形皺襞等。

sentences.english: The patient may show an actual crater deforming indication of active disease.
sentences.chinese: 病人可以出現表現活動病變的真正龕影變形。

sentences.english: These columbaria tend to be run by people with enormous wealth and power.
sentences.chinese: 只要有錢有權，這些龕場很容易運作。

sentences.english: The three rows of columbarium have the same geometry, despite the different material used in each one.
sentences.chinese: 三行骨灰龕使用的材料不同，但幾何形狀都是一樣的。

sentences.english: Ulcer presents clinically as a deep crater, with or without undermining of adjacent skin.
sentences.chinese: 潰瘍臨牀表現爲潰瘍龕，伴或無相鄰皮膚剝離。

sentences.english: The Isaiah Scroll in the Shrine of the Book is a replica.
sentences.chinese: 聖書之龕中的《以賽亞古卷》是一件複製品。

sentences.english: Niche refers to dig for the original rock cliff, to set the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 龕原指掘鑿巖崖爲空，以安置佛像之所。

sentences.english: Do you think it is illegal to run a private columbarium?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲經營私營骨灰龕場是犯法嗎？

sentences.english: Hence, is that columbarium set up by the government or private?
sentences.chinese: 那骨灰龕場是政府經營的還是私營的？

definition: small rooms facing or to the side of the main hall or veranda
a funeral/to encoffin a corpse/to carry to burial
to engrave (on wood or stone)/to inscribe
